Module iu.util.crypt.impl
Package iu.crypt

Class JwsBuilder

java.lang.Object
iu.crypt.JwsBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebCryptoHeader.Builder<JwsBuilder>, WebSignature.Builder<JwsBuilder>
public class JwsBuilder extends Object implements WebSignature.Builder<JwsBuilder>
Collects inputs for Jws encrypted messages.

    • key

      public JwsBuilder key(WebKey key)
      Description copied from interface: WebCryptoHeader.Builder
      The key to use for encrypting or signing.
      Specified by:
      key in interface WebCryptoHeader.Builder<JwsBuilder>
      Parameters:
      key - key to use for encryption or signing; will not be included in the header. Use WebCryptoHeader.Builder.wellKnown(WebKey) to set the key and include well-known component in the header.
      Returns:
      this
